name: Privacy Extension for WhatsApp Web
description: Hi! This unofficial extension hides (and reveals) WhatsApp Web's chat-list content on demand - for more privacy in WhatsApp Web. Notice: WhatsApp is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc. registered in the U.S. and other countries. This extension is an independent project and has no relationship to WhatsApp.
